{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.03270v1", "title": "Power-Aware Digital Twin of Coherent Optical Receiver", "summary": "We propose a digital twin of coherent receivers based on an extended physical
model for predicting quality of transmission under receiver power variations.
We experimentally validate it, demonstrating an accuracy improved by up to
1.5dB.", "main_category": "physics.optics", "categories": "physics.optics", "published": "2025-05-06T08:01:15Z"}
